text: Apalus is a genus of blister beetle from the family Meloidae. The species within the genus Apalus are parasitoids of solitary bees of the families Colletidae and Anthophoridae. ==Species== The following species are classified under the genus Apalus: * Apalus bimaculatus (Linnaeus, 1761) * Apalus binaevus (Prochazka, 1892) * Apalus bipunctatus Germar, 1817 * Apalus creticus (Frivaldsky, 1877) * Apalus gibbicollis Borchmann, 1910 * Apalus guerini (Mulsant, 1858) * Apalus longipennis Pic, 1913 * Apalus montanus Escherich, 1897 * Apalus necydaleus (Pallas, 1782) * Apalus spectabilis E.Frivaldsky, 1835 ==References== Category:Meloidae
title: Apalus
